title: What is the initial step of content marketing? - Writing & Blogging - Quora

response.answer_text: The first step is getting your content created! To really make it easy, pick one form of pillar content (video, for example) and shoot several pieces. These can be short - perhaps no more than 5 minutes. From there, you can convert that video into a blog and/or a podcast episode. At that point, you can start distributing your content across various platforms, hitting several different audiences with different mediums!
